prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:00,860",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "The Advices For Self Improvement"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:01,186",
    "end": "00:00:03,406",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "看这是不是斗牛桥 我也不太懂"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:04,285",
    "end": "00:00:05,006",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "斗牛桥"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:05,106",
    "end": "00:00:05,446",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "巴豆"
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: Những Lời Khuyên Để Tự Hoàn Thiện
Xem đây có phải là Cầu Đấu Bò không, tôi cũng không chắc lắm
